verses.verse: And it came to pass, <S%H1961><s%> when Jabin <S%H2985><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Hazor <S%H2674><s%> had heard <S%H8085><s%> those things, that he sent <S%H7971><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Jobab <S%H3103><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Madon, <S%H4068><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Shimron, <S%H8110><s%> and to <S%H413><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Achshaph, <S%H407><s%>

And to <S%H413><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were on the north <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6828><s%> of the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and of the plains <S%H6160><s%> south <S%H5045><s%> of Chinneroth, <S%H3672><s%> and in the valley, <S%H8219><s%> and in the borders <S%H5299><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%> on the west, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3220><s%>

And to the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> on the east <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4217><s%> and on the west, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3220><s%> and to the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> and the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> and the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> and the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%> in the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and to the Hivite <S%H2340><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> Hermon <S%H2768><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Mizpeh. <S%H4709><s%>

And they went out, <S%H3318><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their hosts <S%H4264><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> them, much <S%H7227><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> even as the sand <S%H2344><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is upon <S%H5921><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> shore <S%H8193><s%> in multitude, <S%H7230><s%> with horses <S%H5483><s%> and chariots <S%H7393><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> many. <S%H7227><s%>

And when all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> were met together, <S%H3259><s%> they came <S%H935><s%> and pitched <S%H2583><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Merom, <S%H4792><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> Be not <S%H408><s%> afraid <S%H3372><s%> because of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them: for <S%H3588><s%> tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> about this <S%H2063><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> will I <S%H595><s%> deliver them up <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> slain <S%H2491><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Israel: <S%H3478><s%> thou shalt hamstring <S%H6131><s%> <S%H853><s%> their horses, <S%H5483><s%> and burn <S%H8313><s%> their chariots <S%H4818><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him, against <S%H5921><s%> them by <S%H5921><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Merom <S%H4792><s%> suddenly; <S%H6597><s%> and they fell <S%H5307><s%> upon them.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who smote <S%H5221><s%> them, and chased <S%H7291><s%> them unto <S%H5704><s%> great <S%H7227><s%> Zidon, <S%H6721><s%> and unto <S%H5704><s%> Misrephoth-maim, <S%H4956><s%> and unto <S%H5704><s%> the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Mizpeh <S%H4708><s%> eastward; <S%H4217><s%> and they smote <S%H5221><s%> them, until <S%H5704><s%> they left <S%H7604><s%> them none <S%H1115><s%> remaining. <S%H8300><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> unto them as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> bade <S%H559><s%> him: he hamstrung <S%H6131><s%> <S%H853><s%> their horses, <S%H5483><s%> and burnt <S%H8313><s%> their chariots <S%H4818><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> at that <S%H1931><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> turned back, <S%H7725><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> <S%H853><s%> Hazor, <S%H2674><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> thereof with the sword: <S%H2719><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> Hazor <S%H2674><s%> formerly <S%H6440><s%> was the head <S%H7218><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> those <S%H428><s%> kingdoms. <S%H4467><s%>

And they smote <S%H5221><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the souls <S%H5315><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were therein with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> utterly destroying <S%H2763><s%> them: there was not <S%H3808><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> left <S%H3498><s%> to breathe: <S%H5397><s%> and he burnt <S%H8313><s%> Hazor <S%H2674><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the cities <S%H5892><s%> of those <S%H428><s%> kings, <S%H4428><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of them, did Joshua <S%H3091><s%> take, <S%H3920><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> them with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and he utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them, as <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

But <S%H7535><s%> as for the cities <S%H5892><s%> that stood still <S%H5975><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> their strength, <S%H8510><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> burned <S%H8313><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> of them, save <S%H2108><s%> <S%H853><s%> Hazor <S%H2674><s%> only; <S%H905><s%> that did Joshua <S%H3091><s%> burn. <S%H8313><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of these <S%H428><s%> cities, <S%H5892><s%> and the cattle, <S%H929><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> took for a prey <S%H962><s%> unto themselves; but <S%H7535><s%> <S%H853><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H120><s%> they smote <S%H5221><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they had destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them, neither <S%H3808><s%> left <S%H7604><s%> they any <S%H3605><s%> to breathe. <S%H5397><s%>

As <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> his servant, <S%H5650><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> did Moses <S%H4872><s%> command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and so <S%H3651><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> Joshua; <S%H3091><s%> he left nothing undone <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5493><s%> <S%H1697><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H2063><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> the hills, <S%H2022><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the south country, <S%H5045><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen, <S%H1657><s%> and the valley, <S%H8219><s%> and the plain, <S%H6160><s%> and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and the valley <S%H8219><s%> of the same;

Even from <S%H4480><s%> the mount <S%H2022><s%> Halak, <S%H2510><s%> that goeth up <S%H5927><s%> to Seir, <S%H8165><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> Baal-gad <S%H1171><s%> in the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon: <S%H2768><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their kings <S%H4428><s%> he took, <S%H3920><s%> and smote <S%H5221><s%> them, and slew <S%H4191><s%> them.
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> a long <S%H7227><s%> time <S%H3117><s%> with <S%H854><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> those <S%H428><s%> kings. <S%H4428><s%>

There was <S%H1961><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> a city <S%H5892><s%> that <S%H834><s%> made peace <S%H7999><s%> with <S%H413><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> save <S%H1115><s%> the Hivites <S%H2340><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gibeon: <S%H1391><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> other they took <S%H3947><s%> in battle. <S%H4421><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> it was <S%H1961><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H853><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to harden <S%H2388><s%> <S%H853><s%> their hearts, <S%H3820><s%> that they should come against <S%H7125><s%> <S%H853><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> in battle, <S%H4421><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> he might destroy <S%H2763><s%> them utterly, and that they might have <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H1115><s%> favor, <S%H8467><s%> but <S%H3588><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> he might destroy <S%H8045><s%> them, as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And at that <S%H1931><s%> time <S%H6256><s%> came <S%H935><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H853><s%> the Anakims <S%H6062><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> Debir, <S%H1688><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> Anab, <S%H6024><s%> and from all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and from all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them utterly with <S%H5973><s%> their cities. <S%H5892><s%>

There was none <S%H3808><s%> of the Anakims <S%H6062><s%> left <S%H3498><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> only <S%H7535><s%> in Gaza, <S%H5804><s%> in Gath, <S%H1661><s%> and in Ashdod, <S%H795><s%> there remained. <S%H7604><s%>

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the whole <S%H3605><s%> land, <S%H776><s%> according to all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses; <S%H4872><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> it for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> unto Israel <S%H3478><s%> according to their divisions <S%H4256><s%> by their tribes. <S%H7626><s%> And the land <S%H776><s%> rested <S%H8252><s%> from war. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4421><s%>
